data.text: @TaylorLorenz @horrorbatsbite They used to say this about lupus too. It’s how it goes until they learn otherwise. Especially true for women.
@TaylorLorenz Didn't realize it's all these symptoms https://t.co/Ol6dMAeGvZ

@TaylorLorenz Long COVID is very misunderstood and the medical community just starting to scratch the surface of the issue. Israel is doing some interesting studies on the long term effects and thus one on LC in kids is quite disturbing. https://t.co/Tx0ertDVdq

@TaylorLorenz Good god. What kind of doctor talks that way about any patient? I was an RN for 40 years and have been a CPPx35 years and psych patient on the other side as well. In all those years I never heard a colleague with this attitude.

@TaylorLorenz Disgusted that any medico would think like this.Thanks to the number of victims of long Covid, now, finally serious research about the devastation caused by ME and CFS is being undertaken after years of underfunding. Time to put ignorant attitudes in the past.
@TaylorLorenz @dianaberrent Is this guy an actual licensed doctor?
@TaylorLorenz thank you for speaking up about ME/CFS and other post-viral illnesses 🥲
@Julian_Schubach Yes she’s fantastic I follow her 🙏🏻💓
